# TimeZones iCal Library - AI Context

# Project Summary
A JavaScript/TypeScript library providing official IANA timezone information for iCalendar (RFC5545) files. 
It includes a C-based build pipeline (`vzic`) to generate the underlying core data from source.
The actual build provides timezone data in the form of VTIMEZONE components for use in iCalendar files - optimized for all popular calendar applications (Outlook, Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, etc.).

- vzic Update Guide: .ai/guides/vzic_update.md
